errors.title: Consent declined

errors.title: We cannot verify your identity
errors.body: The date of birth you provided indicates you are under the age of 16. Unfortunately, we cannot verify your identity.

errors.title: We cannot verify your identity
errors.body: The country you provided is not yet supported. Unfortunately, we cannot verify your identity.
errors.button_text: Have an ID number from another country?
